annotation:
(a) 5 - I certainly do talk a lot, I'm a chatterbox.
(b) 5 - I always notice other people's weaknesses. It's a bit of a hobby of mine.
(c) 5 - I don't do things by halves. If it's worth doing, it's worth doing well.
(d) 5 - I'm constantly in a state of existential dread. Sad? Always.
(e) 1 - Original ideas? No thanks, I'll stick to what I know.
(f) 1 - Keeping my thoughts to myself? Not likely! I love to share.
(g) 1 - I'm not one to extend a helping hand unless it benefits me.
(h) 1 - Careless? I don't think so. I take pride in my work.
(i) 1 - Me, relaxed? Not on your life. The world is a stressful place.
(j) 1 - Curiosity killed the cat, remember? I prefer to stay in my lane.
(k) 5 - I'm always buzzing with energy, ready to dive into a heated debate.
(l) 5 - Starting arguments? Guilty as charged.
(m) 5 - I work hard and I'm proud of it.
(n) 5 - Tense? That's my middle name.
(o) 5 - I do think a lot, mostly about how to outwit others.
(p) 3 - Excitement isn't my main goal, but my rowdy debates can stir things up.
(q) 1 - Forgive easily? Not in my book.
(r) 1 - I'm organized to a fault.
(s) 5 - Worrying is a full-time job for me.
(t) 1 - Imagination is for dreamers. I deal in reality.
(u) 1 - Quiet? I don't think so. I love the sound of my own voice.
(v) 1 - Trust is a luxury I can't afford.
(w) 1 - Lazy? I'm always on the go, stirring the pot.
(x) 1 - I can get upset pretty easily, especially if someone disagrees with me.
(y) 1 - Creativity is overrated. I prefer facts and logic.
(z) 5 - I have a strong personality, and I'm not afraid to show it.
(aa) 5 - Cold and distant is my default setting.
(ab) 5 - I never leave a job half done.
(ac) 5 - I can be quite moody, depending on the day.
(ad) 1 - Artistic experiences? No, thank you.
(ae) 1 - Shy isn't a word in my vocabulary.
(af) 1 - Kindness is overrated. It's a dog eat dog world out there.
(ag) 5 - I always strive to do things thoroughly and efficiently.
(ah) 1 - Calm in difficult situations? I wish.
(ai) 5 - I prefer routine and predictability.
(aj) 5 - I love being the center of attention.
(ak) 5 - I can be quite blunt, some may even say rude.
(al) 5 - Planning is my forte.
(am) 5 - I can get quite nervous, especially when things don't go my way.
(an) 1 - Thinking and playing with ideas? Sounds like a waste of time.
(ao) 5 - I'm not a fan of the arts. Give me logic and facts any day.
(ap) 1 - Cooperate? I'd rather lead.
(aq) 1 - I pay great attention to detail.
(ar) 1 - Art, music, books? Not my cup of tea.
